sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function CartItem({item, value}){ const{id, name, imageUrl, price, total, count}= item; const{increment, decrement, removeItem} = value; return (
{name}
Price : $ {price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
removeItem(id)}>
item total : $ {total}
) }
